array.name: Barman
array.sentence: So I guess you're staying here tonight?

array.name: Client
array.sentence: He'll kill me man! I told you, he's completely out of his mind!

array.name: Barman
array.sentence: These fucking implants... Trust me I've seen this way too much.

array.name: Client
array.sentence: Oh bite me! Not all your problems are on Neurotech!

array.name: Barman
array.sentence: No, for real. Listen, I see a lot of people passing here right? And some old clients that I've known for years...

array.name: Barman
array.sentence: ... and overnight, completely different people! The only thing that changed? They got this shit installed in their brain.

array.name: Client
array.sentence: Oh come on, you're blaming the implants for some rummies who can't control themselves after one too many drinks.

array.name: Barman
array.sentence: No, hear me out! You know Thomas right? He left his man last month, right after getting implanted. They had been together for 20 years! No explanation, nothing, he just said he did not see himself living like this anymore. Next thing you know, he's with some 20 year-old girl. Tom! With a girl!

array.name: Client
array.sentence: Hey, whatever makes him happy I guess.

array.name: Barman
array.sentence: And I've seen a whole lot of good cops getting the federal implant like your buddy, who turned bat shit crazy after that, shooting black people on sight. It's not about you man, it's this crap in his brain that's telling him you're the danger.

array.name: Client
array.sentence: Yeah well, not like that would change from the usual cops.

array.name: Client
array.sentence: ... Not Daniel though, he's not like this...

array.name: Client
array.sentence: Anyway, you've got a room I could stay in tonight?

array.name: Barman
array.sentence: Of course, for as long as you'll need.
